name: THE RED ROOM
description:
A Twin Peaks point and click prototype e.g. not a full/finished game just a short proof of concept of the basic game ideas.

Includes systems for picking up, using and combining items, conversations/dialogue choices and puzzle interactions.

No major or explicit spoilers but contains imagery from the series and a couple of lines of dialogue from season 3.

No affiliation with Twin Peaks, this is just a fan game.
